title: Party identification of U.S. voters over time

content.question: The graph reflects changes in party identification over time. These changes have had substantial effects on electoral processes. (a) Identify the dominant trend in the graph for independents. (b) Explain two reasons why political parties have declined in importance. (c) Explain two reasons why political parties are still an important part of the electoral process.

frqParts.text: The graph reflects changes in party identification over time. These changes have had substantial effects on electoral processes. (a) Identify the dominant trend in the graph for independents. (b) Explain two reasons why political parties have declined in importance. (c) Explain two reasons why political parties are still an important part of the electoral process.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
